mission_skill_config-22000009: A road built temporarily to facilitate traffic on the battlefield. Doesn't seem too steady.
mission_skill_config-22000010: Strongly resembles another facility but possesses a different function - decontamination.
mission_skill_config-22000012:
"Electrical power drove the progress of the Second Industrial Revolution."
 Activating Transformer Substations allows you to provide power to certain facilities.
mission_skill_config-22000013:
"9, did you know? When it comes to electronic items, you don't need flames for a spectacular fireworks display."
 Paralyzes all surrounding enemies and overloads the Transformer Substation.
mission_skill_config-22000014:
"Cool Dolls don't look at explosions!"
 Activates the detonator, which triggers the bombs hidden in the abandoned building.
mission_skill_config-22000015:
"The people inside want to get out, the people outside want to get in..."
 A building which looks like it's been abandoned for a long time. It should provide some cover.
mission_skill_config-22000016:
"It's been 500 years..."
 The ruins of this building are blocking your path. It looks like you can clear it with heavy firepower.
mission_skill_config-22000017:
Before throwing it, shout "Lights out! How do you like that?"
 Causes a single target to stop moving for one turn and greatly decreases their combat capability.
mission_skill_config-22000018: Large Water Valve description, to be added.
mission_skill_config-22000019:
"I will keep supporting others. The casualties won't increase as long as I don't stop." 
 Continuously provide friendly units in combat with shield support, reducing battle losses.

mission_skill_config-20500001: A relatively ordinary kind of chocolate. It looks exquisite, but the taste isn't really the best... However, there are those who value appearance more?
mission_skill_config-20500002: If you want to eat this present, you'll need a set of good teeth. But if you want to use it on a mission, then trust me, it's not much better than the one on your belt.
mission_skill_config-20500003: Mysterious chocolate that's crystal clear and seemingly has some magical ties to the gifter. From its reflected glimmer, you can almost see your destiny.
mission_skill_config-20500004: Chocolate with totally different flavors mixed together, every bite sends thrills of the unknown resounding in your mouth... Why is it spicy?
mission_skill_config-20500005: It kind of sounds like a cocktail, but is actually mocha... The strange color reminds people of unforgettable memories, let's just hope it doesn't taste the same.
mission_skill_config-20500006: A mass-produced run-of-the-mill chocolate. It tastes ordinary, smells ordinary... In a certain sense, being ordinary is a form of happiness.
mission_skill_config-20500007: "Starting from today, we're going to be best friends forever." WA2000

mission_skill_config-20002401:
In this round, upon the end of this echelon's first 5 battles, regenerate each unit by 10%/15%/20%/25%/30% of their maximum HP.
Starting from the 6th battle, the echelon gains Holy Blessing until the end of the round.
Holy Blessing: For the duration of this battle, all echelon members take 10% less damage, and after every 15 seconds, they have all stat debuffs dispelled and are immune to damage for 2 seconds.
